page.title: 10The Lemington Festival
page.content: The festival was held in May 1985.It was organised to promote community involvement;make more people interested in their area and to encourage people to take a more active part in community life.Scchools; churches;girl guides the jazz band and other local voluntary organisations took part. The festival was funded by the local community with the help of the City Council and Northern Arts.It was chiefly a childrens festival with lots of interesting events such as fancy dress competiton,ambulance and fire-brigade displays,art competitions and a Punch and Judy show.The "Evening Chronicle"reported the event on 29th March.It said that there were 125 entrants in a children's triathlon contest.18 teams contested a junior 5 a side football competition and more
